name: Yokai Match
description:
Yokai Match!

An entry for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022.

Explore an urban park in search of mischievous Yokai that have recently moved into the area. Approach and engage in combat to pacify these mysterious beings in order to return the area to normal.

  • Controls
    • Exploration
      • w - move forward
      • a/d - rotate
    • Combat
      • mouse drag - swap tiles

Art:  @MikaDigitalFira
Programming:  @KlassicKent,  Oarc
Audio: Menu Music, Exploration Music, Combat Music, Traffic FX
